name: @pojntfx/dsb-gateway-service
description: A simple gateway microservice to the proprietary "Digitales Schwarzes Brett" service used in German schools. Uses @pojntfx-incubator/dsb-gateway-core to get the data.

scripts.dev: mkdir -p data/ && touch data/db.json && mkdir -p static/img && npm run build:watch & micro-dev dist/index.js --watch dist/
scripts.start: mkdir -p data/ && touch data/db.json && mkdir -p static/img && micro dist/index.js

author: Felicitas Pojtinger <felicitas@pojtinger.com>
